# ai_standard_surface (Arnold) â€” Property Reference
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties
# Map slots use _shader suffix. Clear with: value="undefined"

## Base
base : float                          # base weight 0.0-1.0
base_color : color                    # (color R G B)
base_color_shader : texturemap        # texture map slot
diffuse_roughness : float
metalness : float                     # 0.0-1.0

## Specular
specular : float                      # specular weight 0.0-1.0 (note: capital S in MAXScript)
specular_color : color
specular_color_shader : texturemap
specular_roughness : float            # 0.0 = mirror
specular_roughness_shader : texturemap
specular_IOR : float
specular_shader : texturemap          # specular weight map
specular_anisotropy : float
specular_rotation : float

## Transmission (glass/liquid)
transmission : float                  # 0.0 = opaque, 1.0 = glass
transmission_color : color
transmission_depth : float
transmission_scatter : color
transmission_scatter_anisotropy : float
transmission_dispersion : float
transmission_extra_roughness : float
thin_walled : boolean

## Subsurface
subsurface : float                    # 0.0-1.0 (replaces diffuse with SSS)
subsurface_color : color
subsurface_color_shader : texturemap
subsurface_radius : color             # per-channel scatter radius (R-heavy = skin)
subsurface_scale : float
subsurface_anisotropy : float
subsurface_type : integer             # 0=diffusion, 1=Christensen-Burley, 2=randomwalk

## Sheen
sheen : float
sheen_color : color
sheen_roughness : float

## Coat
coat : float                          # 0.0-1.0
coat_color : color
coat_roughness : float
coat_IOR : float
coat_anisotropy : float
coat_rotation : float
coat_normal_shader : texturemap       # separate normal map for coat
coat_affect_color : float
coat_affect_roughness : float

## Thin Film
thin_film_thickness : float           # 0 = off, ~300-700 for iridescence
thin_film_IOR : float

## Emission
emission : float
emission_color : color
emission_color_shader : texturemap

## Opacity
opacity : color                       # white = opaque

## Normal / Bump
normal_shader : texturemap            # ai_normal_map goes here
tangent_shader : texturemap

## Advanced
caustics : boolean
internal_reflections : boolean
indirect_diffuse : float
indirect_specular : float
